text: Martina Hingis was the defending champion, but had to withdrew due to an ankle injury. Lindsay Davenport won the title by defeating Jelena Dokic 6–3, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== The top four seeds receive a bye into the second round. Martina Hingis, the first seed, dropped out of the tournament. Her bye was given to number nine seed Sandrine Testud. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==External links== * Main and Qualifying draws (WTA) Category:Zurich Open Singles
title: 2001 Swisscom Challenge – Singles
